data.author: Mathias
data.title: A horrifying globalThis polyfill in universal JavaScript · Mathias Bynens
data.description: The globalThis proposal introduces a unified mechanism to access the global this in any JavaScript environment. It sounds like a simple thing to polyfill, but it turns out it’s pretty hard to get right. I didn’t even think it was possible until Toon blew my mind with an unexpected, creative solution.
